meanings.definition: A wild sheep of mountainous regions, having large curving horns in both sexes.
meanings.sent1: The mouflons grazed peacefully on the rocky slopes.
meanings.sent2: We spotted a group of mouflons while hiking in the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous mouflons played a game of hide-and-seek among the boulders.
meanings.sent4: The majestic mouflons stood proudly on the cliff, their horns gleaming in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the mouflons navigating the rugged terrain was truly awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: The reddish-brown wild sheep of Corsica and Sardinia.
meanings.sent1: A flock of mouflons wandered through the Corsican forest.
meanings.sent2: The mouflons in Sardinia are known for their distinctive coloration.
meanings.sent3: The curious mouflons in Corsica tried to nibble on the tourists' backpacks.
meanings.sent4: The elusive mouflons of Sardinia seemed to blend seamlessly with the autumn leaves.
meanings.sent5: The rare sighting of mouflons in the wild sparked excitement among the nature enthusiasts.
